basics.name: Business Development Director
basics.label: Business Development
basics.summary: I am looking for a challenging Business Development position that will utilize my knowledge and passion for sales while leveraging more than twenty years of relationship building.

work.name: Armchair Media
work.summary: Attracting new clients, developing current clients and penetrating existing markets to grow Armchair Media's client base.

work.name: Definition 6
work.summary: Consultant and sell services to include on-Line Media, Interactive Marketing, Web Traffic Analytics, SEO/SEM, Websites, Usability, Hosting and Managed Services, Intranets, E-mail marketing and Social Media.

work.name: LBi Atlanta
work.summary: Consultant and sell services to include, Interactive Strategy & Branding, Emerging Technologies, Rich Media and SEM/SEO.

work.name: VTA/Play
work.summary: Develop marketing strategy for all rich media services, print design and marketing services and broadcast media services.

work.name: Vertis Inc.
work.summary: Prospect for new clients and opportunities (selling, photography services, package design, print advertising, and direct mail).

skills.name: Ability to develop winning sales strategies
Ability to access appropriate client executives
Ability to drive the sales strategy
Ability to anticipate the strategies employed by each competitor
Ability to utilize the client organization chart
Ability to create a relationship strategy for each key player
